attributes.action: Make sure people found guilty of dog fighting are given longer sentences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 25th September 2009 a group of people where found guilty of  dog fighting. The longest sentence to  be handed out was a short 24 week’s. What message does this send to everyone who take’s part in this evil so called sport? 
The poor dogs involved in these fights are seriously injured or even killed. Most become scared and aggressive. Something needs to be done now. Dog’s don’t have a voice but we do! Please sign the petition below.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
